abstract: Bronx man Nicholas Sanchez is arrested and charged with murder and  attempted robbery, among other charges, in connection with shooting of taxi driver Mamadou Barry in Belmont section of Bronx.
lead_paragraph: A Bronx resident was arrested on Wednesday on charges including murder, two days after Mamadou Barry, the driver, was found dead.

headline.main: Man Accused of Killing Bronx Taxi Driver in Fare Dispute
headline.print_headline: Man Accused of Killing Bronx Taxi Driver in Fare Dispute

snippet: A Bronx resident was arrested on Wednesday on charges including murder, two days after Mamadou Barry, the driver, was found dead.
